body.Subject: APM_SQL_Load Pipeline finished!
body.ErrorMessage: APM SQL Load to DW is completed

body.Subject: APM_SQL_Load Pipeline Failed!
body.ErrorMessage: APM SQL Load to DW is failed

copySink.preCopyScript:
BEGIN TRY
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.schemas WHERE name = 'APM') EXEC('Create Schema [APM]');
END TRY
BEGIN CATCH
if ERROR_NUMBER() <> 2714 throw;
END CATCH

IF OBJECT_ID('[APM].[AuditReports]', 'U') IS NULL CREATE TABLE [APM].[AuditReports] ([AuditReportID] int,
[ReportNumber] varchar(25),

[IsDeleted] bit,
[DeletedDate] datetime,
[DeletedBy] int,
[SarcPeriod] varchar(30),
[ReportTypeID] int,
[RequiredAuditWork] bit,
[CorrectiveAction] bit,
[CorrectiveActionComments] varchar(4000),
[KeyStakeholder] bit,
[RequestedByIG] bit,
[ReferralsMade] bit,
[ARCH_ReportID] int);

BEGIN TRY
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.schemas WHERE name = 'APM') EXEC('Create Schema [APM2_0]');
END TRY

if ERROR_NUMBER() <> 2714 throw;
END CATCH
